attributes.action: Abolish the John Lewis list, and abolish the "Ministers Expenses" Systwm
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Re vote for Ministers to fall in line with Private and Corporate Industry with regard to expense claims; these should be relevant to their occupational expenditure and NOT their personal wants. Finance for second homes should come from their private incomes and not the Tax payer. As per Industry.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
